Name: [Artifice] Extendable Short Sword
Desc: Chain attacks deal <color=#2BAD00>considerably more DMG </color>, but the damage taken by your allies is also <color=#2BAD00>greatly increased</color>.
Desc2: When the expansion button is functioning properly, it's a great magic prop for intimidating people. But when the button malfunctions... well, that's even more intimidating.
